# User - Get All Users Data

## Endpoint

`GET /user/`

## Description

This endpoint is only accessible by users with the `admin` role. It retrieves all user data with optional filters and pagination.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication. The requesting user must have the `admin` role to access this resource.

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer \`\` | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| nama | string | No | Filter users by their name. |
| role | string | No | Filter users by their role (`guest`, `penilai`, `admin`). |
| email | string | No | Filter users by their email address. |
| page | number | No | The page number for paginated results (min: 1). |
| limit | number | No | The number of results per page (min: 1). |
| sortBy | string | No | The field to sort results by. |
| order | string | No | The sort order (`ASC` for ascending, `DESC` for descending). |

### Validation

- `nama` must be a string.
    
- `role` must be a string and one of the allowed values: `guest`, `penilai`, `admin`.
    
- `email` must be a valid email format.
    
- `page` must be a number and at least 1.
    
- `limit` must be a number and at least 1.
    
- `sortBy` must be a string.
    
- `order` must be a string and must be either `ASC` or `DESC`.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request query parameters.
    

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Users retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "results": [
            {
                "user_id": "47adcb20-f9d2-4798-bcea-255bacd547b7",
                "nama": "Agus Sucipto",
                "instansi": "IPB",
                "email": "agao@gmail.com",
                "username": "agua",
                "role": "guest",
                "createdAt": "2025-01-20T04:06:09.980Z",
                "is_email_verified": false
            },
            ...
        ],
        "page": 1,
        "limit": 10,
        "totalPages": 2,
        "totalResults": 16
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message. |
| data | object | Contains paginated results and metadata. |
| data.results | array | Array of user objects. |
| data.results\[\].user_id | string | Unique identifier for the user. |
| data.results\[\].nama | string | User's full name. |
| data.results\[\].instansi | string | User's organization or institution. |
| data.results\[\].email | string | User's email address. |
| data.results\[\].username | string | User's username. |
| data.results\[\].role | string | User's role (e.g., guest, admin). |
| data.results\[\].createdAt | string | Timestamp of when the user was created. |
| data.results\[\].is_email_verified | boolean | Whether the user's email has been verified. |
| data.page | number | Current page number of the results. |
| data.limit | number | Maximum number of results per page. |
| data.totalPages | number | Total number of pages available. |
| data.totalResults | number | Total number of results available. |

#### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code . |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

## Notes

- Only users with an `admin` role can access this endpoint.
    
- Any additional parameters in the request query will result in a validation error.

request.description:
# User - Get User Data

## Endpoint

`GET /user/:user_id`

## Description

Retrieves user data. Regular users can only access their own data, while users with an `admin` role can access other users' data.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication. Users can access:

- **Their own data:** A regular user can only fetch their own profile using their `user_id`.
    
- **All users' data:** Admins can access any user's data by specifying their `user_id`.
    

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer \`\` | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| user_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | The unique identifier of the user. |

### Validation

- `user_id` must be a string and a valid UUIDv4.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request query parameters.
    

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "User retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "user_id": "086cd5cd-63db-457a-abe0-d64b0c5bc6f6",
        "nama": "gacorkingz",
        "instansi": "IPB",
        "email": "abc12345556@apps.ipb.ac.id",
        "username": "abc21355556",
        "role": "guest",
        "is_email_verified": false,
        "createdAt": "2025-01-18T11:48:53.901Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-18T15:20:01.960Z"
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message. |
| data | object | Contains user data. |
| data.user_id | string | Unique identifier for the user. |
| data.nama | string | User's full name. |
| data.instansi | string | User's organization or institution. |
| data.email | string | User's email address. |
| data.username | string | User's username. |
| data.role | string | User's role (`guest`, `penilai`, `admin`). |
| data.is_email_verified | boolean | Whether the user's email is verified. |
| data.createdAt | string | Timestamp of when the user was created. |
| data.updatedAt | string | Timestamp of last update. |

---

### Error Responses

#### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Users with an `admin` role can retrieve any user's data.
    
- Regular users can only retrieve their own data using their `user_id`.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- Any additional query parameters will result in a validation error.

# User - Update User Data

## Endpoint

`PATCH /user/:user_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to update their user data. Regular users can only update their own profile, while users with an `admin` role can update any user's profile.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Regular users**: Can update only their own profile.
    
- **Admins**: Can update any user's profile.
    

## Request

### Method

`PATCH`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer \`\` | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| user_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | The unique identifier of the user. |

### Request Body

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| nama | string | No | The full name of the user. |
| instansi | string | No | The organization or institution of the user. |
| email | string | No | The email address of the user. |
| username | string | No | The username of the user. |

### Validation

- `user_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- `nama` must be a string.
    
- `instansi` must be a string.
    
- `email` must be a valid email format.
    
- `username` must be a string.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request query parameters.
    

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "User updated successfully",
    "data": {
        "user_id": "086cd5cd-63db-457a-abe0-d64b0c5bc6f6",
        "nama": "Nama baru user",
        "instansi": "IPB",
        "email": "abc12345556@apps.ipb.ac.id",
        "username": "abc21355556",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-20T06:53:56.038Z"
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message. |
| data | object | Contains updated user information. |
| data.user_id | string | Unique identifier for the user. |
| data.nama | string | Updated full name of the user. |
| data.instansi | string | Updated organization of the user. |
| data.email | string | Updated email address of the user. |
| data.username | string | Updated username of the user. |
| data.updatedAt | string | Timestamp of the last update. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with an `admin` role can update any user's data.
    
- Regular users can only update their own data.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- Any additional parameters in the request will result in a validation error.

response.name: validation error

# User - Delete User Data

## Endpoint

`DELETE /user/:user_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to delete user data. Regular users can only delete their own profile, while users with an `admin` role can delete any user's profile.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Regular users**: Can delete only their own profile.
    
- **Admins**: Can delete any user's profile.
    

## Request

### Method

`DELETE`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| user_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | The unique identifier of the user. |

### Validation

- `user_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request query parameters or body.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "User deleted successfully"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating deletion. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with an `admin` role can delete any user's data.
    
- Regular users can only delete their own data.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- Any additional parameters in the request will result in a validation error.

# User - Verify User Role

## Endpoint

`PUT /user/:id/verify-role`

## Description

This endpoint allows an admin to change a user's role to either `guest` or `penilai`. Only users with an `admin` role can access this endpoint.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Admins**: Can change any user's role to either `guest` or `penilai`.
    

## Request

### Method

`PUT`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| user_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | The unique identifier of the user. |

### Request Body

``` json
{
    "role": "penilai"
}

 ```

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| role | string | Yes | The new role of the user (`guest`, `penilai`). |

### Validation

- `id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- `role` (body parameter) must be either `guest` or `penilai` and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request query parameters.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "User role verified successfully",
    "data": {
        "user_id": "6d83eebd-2d10-421f-b5d1-ca440b56430b",
        "nama": "Andyana L MaFaza 354",
        "instansi": null,
        "email": "andyanamafaza354@gmail.com",
        "username": "Andyana L MaFaza 354",
        "role": "penilai",
        "is_email_verified": true,
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-20T07:12:03.050Z"
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating role update. |
| data | object | Contains updated user information. |
| data.user_id | string | Unique identifier for the user. |
| data.nama | string | Full name of the user. |
| data.instansi | string | Organization or institution of the user. |
| data.email | string | Email address of the user. |
| data.username | string | Username of the user. |
| data.role | string | Updated role of the user. |
| data.is_email_verified | boolean | Whether the user's email is verified. |
| data.updatedAt | string | Timestamp of the last update. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with an `admin` role can verify and change user roles.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- Any additional parameters in the request will result in a validation error.

# User - Get User Profile

## Endpoint

`GET /user/profile`

## Description

This endpoint allows an authenticated user to retrieve their own profile information. No additional parameters are required.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Authenticated users**: Can retrieve their own profile information.
    

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "User profile retrieved successfully",
    "data": {
        "user_id": "bab499eb-0344-40ce-8eda-ecd9d6fe0d46",
        "nama": "admin",
        "instansi": null,
        "email": "admin@gmail.com",
        "username": "admin",
        "role": "admin",
        "is_email_verified": false,
        "createdAt": "2025-01-17T03:34:32.741Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-17T03:34:32.741Z"
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating retrieval. |
| data | object | Contains user profile information. |
| data.user_id | string | Unique identifier for the user. |
| data.nama | string | Full name of the user. |
| data.instansi | string | Organization or institution (nullable). |
| data.email | string | Email address of the user. |
| data.username | string | Username of the user. |
| data.role | string | Role of the user (`admin`, `guest`, etc.). |
| data.is_email_verified | boolean | Whether the user's email is verified. |
| data.createdAt | string | Timestamp of when the user was created. |
| data.updatedAt | string | Timestamp of last update. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- This endpoint is accessible to all authenticated users to fetch their own profile data.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.

request.description:
# Authentication - Login

## Endpoint

`POST /auth/login`

## Description

Authenticates user and returns a JWT token upon successful login.

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| email | string | Yes | User's email address. |
| password | string | Yes | User's password. |

### Validation

- `email` must be a valid email format and is required.
    
- `password` is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Login successful",
    "data": {
        "user_id": "bab499eb-0344-40ce-8eda-ecd9d6fe0d46",
        "nama": "admin",
        "instansi": null,
        "email": "admin@gmail.com",
        "username": "admin",
        "role": "admin",
        "is_email_verified": false
    },
    "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message. |
| data.user_id | string | User's unique ID. |
| data.nama | string | User's full name. |
| data.instansi | string | User's organization (nullable). |
| data.email | string | User's email address. |
| data.username | string | User's username. |
| data.role | string | User's role (e.g., admin, user). |
| data.is_email_verified | boolean | Email verification status. |
| token | string | JWT access token. |

### Error Responses

#### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (400). |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

## Notes

- Ensure that the provided email and password are correct.
    
- The token returned should be used for authenticated requests to other endpoints.
    
- Any additional parameters in the request body will result in a validation error.

# Authentication - Register

## Endpoint

`POST /auth/register`

## Description

This endpoint allows new users to register by providing their details such as name, institution, email, username, and password. Upon successful registration, users will need to log in with their credentials. Users with the `penilai` role must verify their email to activate their account.

## Authorization

This endpoint does **not** require authentication.

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| nama | string | Yes | Full name of the user. |
| instansi | string | Yes | Institution or organization name. |
| email | string | Yes | A valid email address. |
| username | string | Yes | Desired username for the account. |
| password | string | Yes | At least 8 characters long, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, one special character, and have no spaces. |

### Validation

- `nama` must be a string and is required.
    
- `instansi` must be a string and is required.
    
- `email` must be a valid email format and is required.
    
- `username` must be a string and is required.
    
- `password` must be at least 8 characters long, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, one special character, and have no spaces, and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (201 Created)

``` json
{
    "status": 201,
    "message": "Registration successful! Please log in to your account using your credentials. If you're a Penilai user, verify your email address to activate your account"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (201). |
| message | string | Success message indicating registration was successful. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Any additional parameters in the request body will result in a validation error.
    
- Users with the `penilai` role must verify their email before their account is activated.
    
- Ensure that the password meets the required complexity for security purposes.

request.description:
# Authentication - Forgot Password

## Endpoint

`POST /auth/forgot-password`

## Description

This endpoint allows users to request a password reset email by providing their registered email address. If the email exists in the system, a password reset link will be sent to the provided email.

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| email | string | Yes | A valid email address to send the reset link. |

### Validation

- `email` must be a valid email format and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Password reset email sent. Please check your email"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating email has been sent. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Any additional parameters in the request body will result in a validation error.
    
- If the email address is not registered in the system, the response will indicate that the email is not found.
    
- The password reset link will expire in **one hour**.

response.name: success

// Set the token as an environment variable in Postman

request.description:
# Authentication - Reset Password

## Endpoint

`POST /auth/reset-password`

## Description

This endpoint allows users to reset their password by providing a valid token and a new password. The token is sent to the user's email during the forgot password process.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| token | string | Yes | Reset token provided in the forgot password email. |
| password | string | Yes | The new password (must meet security requirements). |

### Validation

- `token` must be a string and is required.
    
- `password` must be at least 8 characters long, include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, one special character, and have no spaces, and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Password reset successfully! Please log in using your new credentials."
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating password reset success. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Any additional parameters in the request body will result in a validation error.
    
- The reset token is valid for **ONE HOUR**; if expired, users need to request a new one.
    
- Ensure the password meets the required security standards for account protection.

request.description:
# Authentication - Send Verification Email

## Endpoint

`POST /auth/send-verification-email`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to request a verification email to be sent to their registered email address. The verification email contains a link to verify their account.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** All authenticated users.
    

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |

### Request Body

_None required._

### Validation

- No request body is required.
    
- The system will use the authenticated user's registered email to send the verification email.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Verification email sent successfully. Please check your inbox."
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating email has been sent. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |

---

## Notes

- The verification link sent in the email will expire after **24 hours**.
    
- If the user's email is not registered in the system, the response will indicate that the email was not found.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.

response.name: success

| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |

# Info - Get Weather by Coordinates

## Endpoint

`GET /info/weather/coordinates`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` to retrieve current weather data based on geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude).

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`

| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| lat | number | Yes | Latitude of the location. |
| lon | number | Yes | Longitude of the location. |

### Validation

- `lat` (query parameter) must be a valid number and is required.
    
- `lon` (query parameter) must be a valid number and is required.

# Lahan - Get All Lahan Data

## Endpoint

`GET /lahan`

## Description

This endpoint retrieves all lahan (land) data with optional filters for pagination, sorting, and various search criteria. The endpoint does **not** require authentication.

## Authorization

No authentication required.

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| page | number | No | The page number for paginated results (min: 1). |
| limit | number | No | The number of results per page. |
| sortBy | string | No | The field to sort results by (`createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `nama_lahan`, `luasan_lahan`, `jenis_tanah`). |
| order | string | No | The sort order (`ASC` for ascending, `DESC` for descending). |
| lahan_id | string | No | Filter by lahan unique ID (UUIDv4 format). |
| nama_lahan | string | No | Filter by lahan name. |
| jenis_tanah | string | No | Filter by lahan soil type. |
| provinsi | string | No | Filter by province. |
| kabupaten | string | No | Filter by district (kabupaten). |
| kecamatan | string | No | Filter by sub-district (kecamatan). |
| desa | string | No | Filter by village (desa). |
| hasil_penilaian | string | No | Filter by assessment result. |
| skor_min | number | No | Minimum score filter. |
| skor_max | number | No | Maximum score filter. |
| tanggal_kejadian_start | date | No | Start date of incident (ISO format). |
| tanggal_kejadian_end | date | No | End date of incident (ISO format). |
| tanggal_penilaian_start | date | No | Start date of assessment (ISO format). |
| tanggal_penilaian_end | date | No | End date of assessment (ISO format). |

### Validation

- `page` must be a number and at least 1.
    
- `limit` must be a number or null.
    
- `sortBy` must be a string and one of `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `nama_lahan`, `luasan_lahan`, `jenis_tanah`.
    
- `order` must be either `ASC` or `DESC`.
    
- `lahan_id` must be a valid UUIDv4 format if provided.
    
- `nama_lahan`, `provinsi`, `kabupaten`, `kecamatan`, `desa`, and `hasil_penilaian` must be strings if provided.
    
- `skor_min` and `skor_max` must be numbers if provided.
    
- `tanggal_kejadian_start`, `tanggal_kejadian_end`, `tanggal_penilaian_start`, and `tanggal_penilaian_end` must be valid ISO date strings if provided.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request query.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil get results",
    "data": {
        "results": [
            {
                "lokasi_region": {
                    "provinsi": "JAWA BARAT",
                    "kabupaten": "KOTA BOGOR",
                    "kecamatan": "BOGOR BARAT",
                    "desa": "CILENDEK TIMUR"
                },
                "lahan": {
                    "lahan_id": "213f96ea-e8ef-4fa2-9865-c983802a268e",
                    "nama_lahan": "Lahan Aam",
                    "jenis_tanah": "Tanah Rawa",
                    "latitude": -6.5758938,
                    "longitude": 106.7777674,
                    "luasan_lahan": 0,
                    "polygon": {
                        "crs": {
                            "type": "name",
                            "properties": {
                                "name": "EPSG:4326"
                            }
                        },
                        "type": "Polygon",
                        "coordinates": [
                            [
                                [
                                    114.87144055484606,
                                    0.21631826025005188
                                ],
                                [
                                    111.22630049471834,
                                    0.3534992343076691
                                ],
                                [
                                    113.37549597819869,
                                    -2.7679608401120754
                                ],
                                [
                                    114.87144055484606,
                                    0.21631826025005188
                                ]
                            ]
                        ]
                    },
                    "observasiTerakhir": {
                        "luasan_karhutla": 0,
                        "jenis_karhutla": "Kebakaran permukaan",
                        "tinggi_muka_air_gambut": 0,
                        "penggunaan_lahan": "Padang rumput",
                        "tutupan_lahan": "Semak Belukar",
                        "jenis_vegetasi": "Gmelina",
                        "temperatur": 24.26,
                        "curah_hujan": 0,
                        "kelembapan_udara": 90,
                        "tanggal_kejadian": "2025-02-20T00:00:00.000Z",
                        "tanggal_penilaian": "2025-02-20T00:00:00.000Z",
                        "skor_akhir": 64,
                        "hasil_penilaian": "Berat"
                    }
                }
            },
            {
                "lokasi_region": {
                    "provinsi": "Kalimantan Tengah",
                    "kabupaten": "Kabupaten Barito Utara",
                    "kecamatan": "Kecamatan Dusun Hilir",
                    "desa": "Desa Dusun Halah"
                },
                "lahan": {
                    "lahan_id": "20ed44de-7813-47e8-9c10-9417fbb23c9e",

                    "longitude": 111.03647347058305,
                    "luasan_lahan": 6823806.62,
                    "polygon": null,
                    "observasiTerakhir": null
                }
            }
            ...
        ],

        "limit": 10,
        "totalPages": 1,
        "totalResults": 1
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating the data retrieval status. |
| data | object | Contains the response data. |
| data.results | array | List of lahan (land) records. |
| data.results\[\].lokasi_region | object | Contains location details of the lahan. |
| data.results\[\].lokasi_region.provinsi | string | Province where the lahan is located. |
| data.results\[\].lokasi_region.kabupaten | string | District (Kabupaten) where the lahan is located. |
| data.results\[\].lokasi_region.kecamatan | string | Sub-district (Kecamatan) where the lahan is located. |
| data.results\[\].lokasi_region.desa | string | Village (Desa) where the lahan is located. |
| data.results\[\].lahan | object | Contains detailed information about the lahan. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.lahan_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier for the lahan. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.nama_lahan | string | Name of the lahan. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.jenis_tanah | string | Type of soil present in the lahan. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.latitude | number | Latitude coordinate of the lahan location. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.longitude | number | Longitude coordinate of the lahan location. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.luasan_lahan | number | Area size of lahan. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.polygon | object/null | Geographical polygon data representing the lahan boundary, or null if not provided. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir | object/null | Contains latest observation data of the lahan, or null if not available. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.luasan_karhutla | number | Area affected by forest fire (if any). |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.jenis_karhutla | string | Type of forest fire event (if any). |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.tinggi_muka_air_gambut | number | Peat water table height during the latest observation. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.penggunaan_lahan | string | Land usage type during the latest observation. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.tutupan_lahan | string | Land cover type during the latest observation. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.jenis_vegetasi | string | Type of vegetation found during the latest observation. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.temperatur | number | Temperature recorded during the latest observation. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.curah_hujan | number | Rainfall level during the latest observation. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.kelembapan_udara | number | Air humidity level recorded. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.tanggal_kejadian | string (ISO 8601) | Date of incident occurrence. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.tanggal_penilaian | string (ISO 8601) | Date of assessment. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.skor_akhir | number | Final score of the lahan assessment. |
| data.results\[\].lahan.observasiTerakhir.hasil_penilaian | string | Assessment result (e.g., "Berat"). |
| data.page | number | Current page number of paginated results. |
| data.limit | number | Number of records returned per page. |
| data.totalPages | number | Total number of pages available. |
| data.totalResults | number | Total number of records available. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- The endpoint does not require authentication.
    
- Any additional parameters in the request query will result in a validation error.
    
- The response includes paginated lahan data with detailed information on location, land use, and observations.

# Lahan - Delete Lahan Data

## Endpoint

`DELETE /lahan/:lahan_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to delete a specific lahan (land) record by providing its unique identifier.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

## Request

### Method

`DELETE`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| lahan_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the lahan to delete. |

### Validation

- `lahan_id` must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request parameters.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil delete data lahan"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating deletion. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

# Observasi - Upload Observasi Documentation

## Endpoint

`POST /observasi/dokumentasi/`

## Description

This endpoint allows users to upload documentation images related to an `observasi` (observation) of a forest fire event. A maximum of **3 images** can be uploaded per request, with a maximum size of **10MB per file**. Only `image/jpeg`, `image/jpg`, and `image/png` file types are allowed.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |
| Content-Type | multipart/form-data | Specifies the request format for file uploads. |

### Request Body (Multipart Form-Data)

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| penilaian_observasi_id | string | Yes | Unique identifier of the penilaian observasi (UUIDv4). |
| provinsi | string | Yes | Province where the documentation is recorded. |
| kabupaten | string | Yes | District (kabupaten) where the documentation is recorded. |
| kecamatan | string | Yes | Sub-district (kecamatan) where the documentation is recorded. |
| desa | string | Yes | Village (desa) where the documentation is recorded. |
| kategori | string | Yes | Category of the documentation (e.g., "Kematian Pohon"). |
| tipe | string | Yes | Type of documentation (e.g., "Kerusakan dedaunan"). |
| variable | string | Yes | Variable of documentation (e.g., "Pohon mati"). |
|  | file | Yes | Up to 3 image files (`jpeg`, `jpg`, `png`), max 10MB each. |

### Validation

- `penilaian_observasi_id` must be a valid UUIDv4 and is required.
    
- `tipe`, `provinsi`, `kabupaten`, `kecamatan`, `desa`, and `kategori` are required.
    
- Up to 3 image files are allowed in each request.
    
- Each image file must not exceed 10MB.
    
- Only `image/jpeg`, `image/jpg`, and `image/png` file formats are accepted.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

---

## Example cURL Request

``` bash
curl --location 'https://sipartan.gusendra.site/observasi/dokumentasi/' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>' \
--form 'penilaian_observasi_id="15a73525-eae7-477d-b1d3-b157a9dd5a77"' \
--form 'provinsi="Jawa Barat"' \
--form 'kabupaten="Bogor"' \
--form 'kecamatan="Cibinong"' \
--form 'desa="Tengah"' \
--form 'tipe="Kerusakan dedaunan"' \
--form 'kategori="Kematian Pohon"' \
--form 'files=@"/path/to/image1.png"' \
--form 'files=@"/path/to/image2.jpg"'

 ```

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Successfully created documentation",
    "data": {
        "imageUrls": [
            "http://localhost:9001/observasi/dokumentasi/0e2d655f-c57a-45fa-9ebb-955850d23e85",
            "http://localhost:9001/observasi/dokumentasi/848a5493-5ef9-4be2-83e3-26e806cf7ff1"
        ]
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating the upload status. |
| data | object | Contains the URLs of the uploaded images. |
| data.imageUrls | array | List of URLs pointing to the uploaded images. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- A maximum of 3 files are allowed per request.
    
- Files exceeding the size limit of 10MB will be rejected.
    
- The uploaded files will be stored in MinIO and accessible via the returned URLs.

response.name: error: files too large

# Observasi - Get Observasi Documentation Image

## Endpoint

`GET /observasi/dokumentasi/:dokumentasi_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` to retrieve an image of the documentation related to an `observasi` (observation). The image is streamed directly from MinIO storage and sent in the response.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| dokumentasi_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the documentation image. |

### Validation

- `dokumentasi_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request parameters.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

**Headers:**

```
Content-Type: image/jpeg | image/png
Content-Disposition: inline

 ```

#### Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | string | Specifies the response type (image/jpeg, image/png). |
| Content-Disposition | string | Indicates the file is displayed inline. |
| Body | binary | Binary image data streamed directly from MinIO. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- This endpoint directly streams the image, allowing the user to view it in a browser or download it.
    
- If the provided `dokumentasi_id` does not exist, a 404 error will be returned.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.

## Request

`DELETE`

| Key | Value | Description |

| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| dokumentasi_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the documentation image to be deleted. |

### Validation

- `dokumentasi_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request parameters.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil delete dokumentasi"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating successful deletion. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- If the provided `dokumentasi_id` does not exist, a 404 error will be returned.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- No additional parameters should be included in the request.

request.description:
# Observasi - Get All Penilaian

## Endpoint

`GET /observasi/penilaian/`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` to retrieve a list of all `penilaian`.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Query Parameters

_None_

### Validation

- No additional parameters are allowed in the request query.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil get all penilaian",
    "data": [
        {
            "penilaian_id": "bea8a448-e010-4725-9e20-1e6f465f522f",
            "variable": "Pohon mati",
            "type": "Kondisi Vegetasi",
            "deskripsi": null,
            "kategori": "Kematian pohon",
            "bobot": 8,
            "nilai": 1,
            "createdAt": "2025-01-15T05:58:07.118Z",
            "updatedAt": "2025-01-15T05:58:07.118Z"
        }
        ...
    ]
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating data retrieval. |
| data | array | List of retrieved penilaian records. |
| data\[\].penilaian_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier for the penilaian. |
| data\[\].variable | string | Name of the assessed variable. |
| data\[\].type | string | Type of assessment (e.g., "Kondisi Vegetasi"). |
| data\[\].deskripsi | string/null | Description of the assessment. |
| data\[\].kategori | string | Category of the assessment. |
| data\[\].bobot | number | Weightage assigned to the assessment. |
| data\[\].nilai | number | Value assigned to the assessment. |
| data\[\].createdAt | string (ISO8601) | Timestamp when the record was created. |
| data\[\].updatedAt | string (ISO8601) | Timestamp of the last update. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- No additional query parameters should be included in the request.

request.description:
# Observasi - Create New Penilaian

## Endpoint

`POST /observasi/penilaian/`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` to create a new `penilaian`.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |

### Request Body

``` json
{
    "variable": "Tinggi",
    "type": "Kondisi Tanah",
    "kategori": "Tingkat Keparahan Kondisi Tanah Gambut",
    "deskripsi": "Bila lapisan gambut yang terbakar sampai kedalaman lebih dari 50 cm",
    "bobot": 30,
    "nilai": 3
}

 ```

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| variable | string | Yes | The name of the `penilaian` variable. |
| type | string | Yes | The type/category of the `penilaian`. |
| kategori | string | Yes | The category under which the `penilaian` falls. |
| deskripsi | string | No | Additional description of the `penilaian`. |
| bobot | number | Yes | The weight assigned to the `penilaian`. |
| nilai | number | Yes | The value assigned to the `penilaian`. |

### Validation

- `variable`, `type`, and `kategori` are required and must be strings.
    
- `deskripsi` is optional and should be a string if provided.
    
- `bobot` and `nilai` are required and must be numbers.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil create penilaian",
    "data": {
        "penilaian_id": "d9166bdc-250b-47b7-8f27-d76d1a295cbe",
        "variable": "test",
        "type": "test",
        "deskripsi": "tes",
        "kategori": "test",
        "bobot": 111,
        "nilai": 11,
        "updatedAt": "2025-01-21T03:54:41.679Z",
        "createdAt": "2025-01-21T03:54:41.679Z"
    }
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating creation success. |
| data | object | Contains the created `penilaian` record. |
| data.penilaian_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier of the created `penilaian`. |
| data.variable | string | The `penilaian` variable name. |
| data.type | string | The type/category of the `penilaian`. |
| data.deskripsi | string | Additional description (if provided). |
| data.kategori | string | The category of the `penilaian`. |
| data.bobot | number | The weight assigned to the `penilaian`. |
| data.nilai | number | The value assigned to the `penilaian`. |
| data.createdAt | string (ISO8601) | Timestamp when the record was created. |
| data.updatedAt | string (ISO8601) | Timestamp of the last update. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- All required fields must be provided to successfully create a new `penilaian`.

# Observasi - Delete Plot

## Endpoint

`DELETE /observasi/plot/:plot_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` to delete a specific plot associated with an `observasi` (observation).

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`DELETE`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| plot_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the plot to delete. |

### Validation

- `plot_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request parameters.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil delete plot"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating successful deletion. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- If the provided `plot_id` does not exist, a 404 error will be returned.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- No additional parameters should be included in the request.

# Observasi - Edit Plot Data

## Endpoint

`PATCH /observasi/plot/:plot_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to update details of an existing plot associated with an observasi (observation) record related to a forest fire (kebakaran hutan). Only users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` can access this endpoint.

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`

# Observasi - Create New Observasi

## Endpoint

`POST /observasi`

## Description

This endpoint allows users with the role of `penilai` or `admin` to create an observation (observasi) when a forest fire (kebakaran hutan) occurs. It records details such as temperature, rainfall, humidity, and affected areas.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`POST`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Request Body

``` json
{
    "lahan_id": "20ed44de-7813-47e8-9c10-9417fbb23c9e",
    "jenis_karhutla": "Parah",
    "temperatur": 27,
    "curah_hujan": 21,
    "kelembapan_udara": 12,
    "tanggal_kejadian": "2025-02-14T07:18:50Z",
    "tanggal_penilaian": "2025-02-14T07:18:50Z",
    "tutupan_lahan": "Hutan Tanaman Industri",
    "jenis_vegetasi": "Sempiringan",
    "tinggi_muka_air_gambut": 5,
    "penggunaan_lahan": "Dataran Tinggi",
    "dataPlot": [
        {
            "coordinates": [
                [
                    -6.171689143165808, 106.82342102898475
                ],
                [
                    -6.171765252323471, 106.82913697441955
                ],
                [
                    -6.179934238323546, 106.83089768975438
                ],
                [
                    -6.17990886899694, 106.82329344091704
                ],
                [
                    -6.171689143165808, 106.82342102898475
                ]
            ],
            "penilaian_id": [
                "16027370-8ccc-4f2f-8945-3fd1e3916ac2",
                "0848358e-0586-40e8-85c1-4c750abe3715",
                "08267fd8-b7fa-4ced-860d-26920bfd89b3",
                "14d79844-a01c-4191-a6a9-9f918bd23312",
                "85fd9192-c291-4665-b80b-ba72b51dbdfe",
                "8197b1f6-f52f-4f18-8c14-e97ae121e2f1",
                "13045398-39f2-4978-83b4-0976788adb45",
                "fae04b6b-49af-42e8-9d74-df0c0a8863fa",
                "9871b50a-8679-4dc3-b922-2a0b480cca5a"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
 ```

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| lahan_id | string | Yes | Unique identifier of the lahan (UUIDv4). |
| jenis_karhutla | string | Yes | Type of forest fire. |
| temperatur | number | Yes | Temperature during the fire incident. |
| curah_hujan | number | Yes | Rainfall level during the fire incident. |
| kelembapan_udara | number | Yes | Air humidity level during the fire incident. |
| tanggal_kejadian | string | Yes | Date of the incident (ISO format). |
| tanggal_penilaian | string | Yes | Date of the assessment (ISO format). |
| tutupan_lahan | string | Yes | Land cover type. |
| jenis_vegetasi | string | Yes | Type of vegetation. |
| tinggi_muka_air_gambut | number | No | Peat water table height. |
| penggunaan_lahan | string | Yes | Land usage type. |
| dataPlot | array | Yes | List of observation plots with coordinates and assessment data. |
| dataPlot\[\].coordinates | array | Yes | Polygon coordinates defining the plot area. |
| dataPlot\[\].penilaian_id | array | Yes | List of assessment IDs related to the observation. |

### Validation

- `lahan_id` must be a valid UUIDv4 and is required.
    
- `jenis_karhutla`, `temperatur`, `curah_hujan`, `kelembapan_udara`, `tanggal_kejadian`, `tanggal_penilaian`, `tutupan_lahan`, `jenis_vegetasi`, and `penggunaan_lahan` are required.
    
- `tanggal_kejadian` and `tanggal_penilaian` must be valid ISO date strings.
    
- `dataPlot` must contain at least one plot with:
    
    - `coordinates` of at least 4 pairs `[latitude, longitude]`.
        
    - `penilaian_id` must contain valid UUIDv4 values.
        
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil create data observasi",
    "data": {
        "observasi_id": "ef270d50-6a00-47bb-91d2-784362b4c8eb",
        "skor_akhir": 100,
        "luasan_karhutla": 667.5,
        "plots": [
            {
                "plot_id": "d8d817f7-514a-46a9-a2e2-0979b6202ca0",
                "penilaianList": [
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "3db6447a-622b-41f1-97b1-1a5773467158",
                        "penilaian_id": "16027370-8ccc-4f2f-8945-3fd1e3916ac2"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "9543c5e6-0bca-44a1-a5a1-5d0b1bc96df5",
                        "penilaian_id": "0848358e-0586-40e8-85c1-4c750abe3715"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "604f84f7-6452-427f-b02a-c0eff6c7179a",
                        "penilaian_id": "08267fd8-b7fa-4ced-860d-26920bfd89b3"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "877ebea9-795c-498c-bbf3-72ffc1078bc5",
                        "penilaian_id": "14d79844-a01c-4191-a6a9-9f918bd23312"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "93a7b078-fba6-4629-849c-064de13e610e",
                        "penilaian_id": "85fd9192-c291-4665-b80b-ba72b51dbdfe"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "4949f874-48fd-4667-acd8-46c0baa3f736",
                        "penilaian_id": "8197b1f6-f52f-4f18-8c14-e97ae121e2f1"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "0803de8e-0547-40af-8e58-7e10508c421b",
                        "penilaian_id": "13045398-39f2-4978-83b4-0976788adb45"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "38b6dd7e-9904-4d7d-92d9-68597537328a",
                        "penilaian_id": "fae04b6b-49af-42e8-9d74-df0c0a8863fa"
                    },
                    {
                        "penilaian_observasi_id": "55c0fc64-d68a-4b3b-b976-3d1b556a7c99",
                        "penilaian_id": "9871b50a-8679-4dc3-b922-2a0b480cca5a"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}
 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message. |
| data | object | Contains the created observasi details. |
| data.observasi_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier for the observasi. |
| data.skor_akhir | number | Final score of the observation. |
| data.luasan_karhutla | number | Total affected area in square meters. |
| data.plots | array | List of observation plots. |
| data.plots\[\].plot_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier of the plot. |
| data.plots\[\].penilaianList | array | List of assessment data for the plot. |
| data.plots\[\].penilaianList\[\].penilaian_observasi_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier for the assessment-observation relation. |
| data.plots\[\].penilaianList\[\].penilaian_id | string (UUID) | Assessment identifier related to the plot. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- If the provided `lahan_id` or `penilaian_id` does not exist, an error will be returned.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- The `skor_akhir` is calculated based on the provided assessment data.
    
- The `luasan_karhutla` represents the total area covered by the provided coordinates.

# Observasi - Get Observasi Data

## Endpoint

`GET /observasi`

## Description

This endpoint allows anyone to retrieve a paginated list of `observasi` (forest fire observations) along with associated data such as user details, lahan (land) details, and assessment results.

## Authorization

No authentication is required. This endpoint is accessible to everyone.

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

_None required._

### Query Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Default | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| page | number | No | 1 | The page number for paginated results (min: 1). |
| limit | number | No | 10 | The number of results per page (min: 1). |
| sortBy | string | No | createdAt | The field to sort results by. |
| order | string | No | DESC | Sort order (`ASC` for ascending, `DESC` for descending). |
| lahan_id | string (UUIDv4) | No | \- | Filter by lahan (land) ID. |
| user_id | string (UUIDv4) | No | \- | Filter by user ID. |
| hasil_penilaian | string | No | \- | Filter by observation assessment result. |
| skor_min | number | No | \- | Minimum score filter. |
| skor_max | number | No | \- | Maximum score filter. |
| tanggal_kejadian_start | string (ISO8601) | No | \- | Start date of the fire incident. |
| tanggal_kejadian_end | string (ISO8601) | No | \- | End date of the fire incident. |
| tanggal_penilaian_start | string (ISO8601) | No | \- | Start date of the assessment. |
| tanggal_penilaian_end | string (ISO8601) | No | \- | End date of the assessment. |
| jenis_karhutla | string | No | \- | Filter by type of forest fire. |

### Validation

- `page` and `limit` must be positive integers (min: 1).
    
- `sortBy` must be a string the valid option is either ('tanggal_kejadian','tanggal_penilaian','luasan_karhutla','jenis_karhutla','tinggi_muka_air_gambut','penggunaan_lahan','tutupan_lahan','jenis_vegetasi','temperatur','curah_hujan','kelembapan_udara','skor_akhir','createdAt','updatedAt') .
    
- `order` must be either `ASC` or `DESC`.
    
- `lahan_id` and `user_id` must be valid UUIDv4 strings if provided.
    
- `tanggal_kejadian_start`, `tanggal_kejadian_end`, `tanggal_penilaian_start`, `tanggal_penilaian_end` must be valid ISO date strings.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request query.
    

---

request.description:
# Observasi - Get Observasi Detail

## Endpoint

`GET /observasi/:observasi_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows anyone to retrieve detailed information about a specific `observasi` (forest fire observation), including user information, lahan (land) details, and assessment results.

## Authorization

No authentication is required. This endpoint is accessible to everyone.

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

_None required._

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| observasi_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the observasi. |

### Validation

- `observasi_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request parameters.
    

---

# Observasi - Edit Observasi Data

## Endpoint

`PATCH /observasi/:observasi_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to update details of an existing observasi (observation) record related to a forest fire (kebakaran hutan). Only users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` can access this endpoint.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`PATCH`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | application/json | Specifies the request format. |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| observasi_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the observasi to update. |

### Request Body

``` json
{
    "jenis_karhutla": "kebakaran besar",
    "temperatur": 100,
    "curah_hujan": 99,
    "kelembapan_udara": 13,
    "tanggal_kejadian": "2024-02-27T06:25:54.633Z",
    "tanggal_penilaian": "2024-03-04T06:25:54.633Z"
}

 ```

### Body Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| jenis_karhutla | string | No | Type of forest fire. |
| temperatur | number | No | Updated temperature during the fire incident. |
| curah_hujan | number | No | Updated rainfall level during the fire incident. |
| kelembapan_udara | number | No | Updated air humidity level during the fire incident. |
| tanggal_kejadian | string | No | Updated date of the incident (ISO format). |
| tanggal_penilaian | string | No | Updated date of the assessment (ISO format). |
| tutupan_lahan | string | No | Updated land cover type. |
| jenis_vegetasi | string | No | Updated type of vegetation. |
| tinggi_muka_air_gambut | number | No | Updated peat water table height. |
| penggunaan_lahan | string | No | Updated land usage type. |

### Validation

- `observasi_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- `jenis_karhutla`, `temperatur`, `curah_hujan`, `kelembapan_udara`, `tanggal_kejadian`, `tanggal_penilaian`, `tutupan_lahan`, `jenis_vegetasi`, `tinggi_muka_air_gambut`, and `penggunaan_lahan` are optional.
    
- `tanggal_kejadian` and `tanggal_penilaian` must be valid ISO date strings if provided.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request body.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil edit observasi",
    "data": {
        "observasi_id": "ef270d50-6a00-47bb-91d2-784362b4c8eb",
        "user_id": "72ed3c33-8c6b-41aa-86f9-3f9bc0f39377",
        "lahan_id": "20ed44de-7813-47e8-9c10-9417fbb23c9e",
        "tanggal_kejadian": "2025-02-14T07:18:50.000Z",
        "tanggal_penilaian": "2025-02-14T07:18:50.000Z",
        "luasan_karhutla": 667.5,
        "jenis_karhutla": "Parah",
        "tinggi_muka_air_gambut": 0,
        "penggunaan_lahan": "Dataran Tinggi",
        "tutupan_lahan": "Hutan Tanaman Industri",
        "jenis_vegetasi": "semporongan",
        "temperatur": 27,
        "curah_hujan": 21,
        "kelembapan_udara": 12,
        "skor_akhir": 100,
        "createdAt": "2025-02-21T03:29:08.863Z",
        "updatedAt": "2025-02-21T06:38:12.917Z"
    }
}
 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message. |
| data | object | Contains the updated observasi details. |
| data.observasi_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier for the observasi. |
| data.user_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier of the user who made the update. |
| data.lahan_id | string (UUID) | Unique identifier of the associated lahan. |
| data.tanggal_kejadian | string (ISO8601) | Date of the incident occurrence. |
| data.tanggal_penilaian | string (ISO8601) | Date of the assessment. |
| data.luasan_karhutla | number | Total affected area in square meters. |
| data.jenis_karhutla | string | Updated type of forest fire. |
| data.temperatur | number | Updated temperature recorded. |
| data.curah_hujan | number | Updated rainfall level recorded. |
| data.kelembapan_udara | number | Updated air humidity recorded. |
| data.tutupan_lahan | string | Updated land cover type. |
| data.jenis_vegetasi | string | Updated type of vegetation. |
| data.tinggi_muka_air_gambut | number | Updated peat water table height. |
| data.penggunaan_lahan | string | Updated land usage type. |
| data.skor_akhir | number | Final evaluation score. |
| data.createdAt | string (ISO8601) | Timestamp of creation. |
| data.updatedAt | string (ISO8601) | Timestamp of last update. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- If the provided `observasi_id` does not exist, a 404 error will be returned.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- Fields not provided in the request body will remain unchanged.
    
- Any additional fields in the request will result in a validation error.

# Observasi - Delete Observasi Data

## Endpoint

`DELETE /observasi/:observasi_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to delete an existing observasi (observation) record related to a forest fire (kebakaran hutan). Only users with the roles `penilai` or `admin` can access this endpoint.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`DELETE`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| observasi_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the observasi to delete. |

### Validation

- `observasi_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request parameters.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "status": 200,
    "message": "Berhasil delete observasi"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code (200). |
| message | string | Success message indicating deletion. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- If the provided `observasi_id` does not exist, a 404 error will be returned.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- Any additional parameters in the request will result in a validation error.

# Observasi - Get Observasi Report (PDF)

## Endpoint

`GET /observasi/pdf/:observasi_id`

## Description

This endpoint allows authenticated users to download an observasi (observation) report in PDF format. The response is a direct PDF buffer that can be viewed or downloaded.

## Authorization

This endpoint requires Bearer Token authentication.

- **Roles allowed:** `penilai`, `admin`
    

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

| Key | Value | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Authorization | Bearer | Bearer token for authentication. |

### Path Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| observasi_id | string (UUIDv4) | Yes | Unique identifier of the observasi report to download. |

### Validation

- `observasi_id` (path parameter) must be a valid UUIDv4 string and is required.
    
- No additional fields are allowed in the request parameters.
    

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

**Headers:**

```
Content-Type: application/pdf
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=observasi_<observasi_id>.pdf

 ```

#### Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Content-Type | string | Specifies the response type as `application/pdf`. |
| Content-Disposition | string | Sets the filename of the downloaded PDF. |
| Body | binary | PDF buffer containing the observasi report. |

---

### Error Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| status | number | HTTP status code. |
| message | string | Error message description. |
| errors | array | List of validation errors (if any). |

---

## Notes

- The PDF report will be directly sent in the response and can be downloaded or opened in the browser.
    
- Only users with `penilai` or `admin` roles can access this endpoint.
    
- Ensure the Bearer token is valid and has the required permissions.
    
- If the `observasi_id` does not exist, a 404 error will be returned.
    
- No additional parameters should be included in the request.

# Ping - Health Check

## Endpoint

`GET /ping`

## Description

This endpoint is used to check the health and availability of the server. It returns a simple response to confirm that the server is operational.

## Authorization

No authentication is required. This endpoint is accessible to everyone.

## Request

### Method

`GET`

### Headers

_None required._

### Query Parameters

_None required._

---

## Responses

### Success Response (200 OK)

``` json
{
    "message": "pong",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-22T07:56:22.724Z"
}

 ```

#### Success Response Details

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| message | string | A confirmation message ("pong"). |
| timestamp | string | Current server timestamp in ISO8601 format. |

---

## Notes

- This endpoint can be used for monitoring and uptime checks.
    
- No authentication or additional parameters are required.
